title: Whazzat?
creator_credit: Art Pierson, Todd Delerman and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Presents an adaptation of the East Indian folktale about six blind men who come upon an elephant and attempt to describe it. When each meets and touches the elephant he thinks he has encountered something different. Stresses the moral that cooperating with others can achieve more than working alone. For primary grades.
